text: Hello, how's your Labor Day going so far?
So far so good.  How are you?
I'm doing well, just finished dinner with the family so now it's back to Turking heh.
I guess so.  I just had a nice lunch myself.
Nice nice. Hey have you ever heard of the Save the Children foundation?
No, I haven't.  What is it?
Their an organization that provides aid and relief to children all over the globe.
What kind of relief do they provide?
They help with food for kids that are starving, and medical aid to those that need it but can't afford it.
Nice.  How much of what they take in goes for salaries?
The split ends up being 86% for the kids, 5% for fundraisers and the remaining 9% pay the salaries
Do they provide any educational benefits for the kids?
They do support a multitude of education programs in impoverished areas for the children. Hopefully with enough support they can do more and more for the suffering kids.
Do you know the cut-off age for assistance?

I don't have that information unfortunately, but I do want to let you know this HIT gives us an opportunity to donate a portion of our payment directly to the foundation, would you be interested in donating a portion of your payment to help the kids?
I might be willing to donate a very small amount.
That's great, if you don't mind what amount would you donate? I like to match the donation with my partner on these hits when possible.
Oh, that's really nice of you to do that.  Give me a second to think.
I figure if enough of us give even just a small amount it can make a huge difference in the children's lives all around the globe.
OK.  I can afford to donate .03 cents.
